title: DARPA wants to build cargo delivery vehicles that self destruct when the job’s done
text:
DARPA wants to build cargo delivery vehicles that self destruct when the job’s done 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
DARAP recently announced its ICARUS project, an initiative dedicated to the development of air vehicles that disappear upon mission completi...
